quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First off, try to venture south. After that, go south. Then, go west. Following that, head north. Then, make an attempt to go north. After that, attempt to move west. Next, try to move north. Next, go to the north. With that done, go west. Then, attempt to head west. Next, go south. And then, take a trip south. Then, try to head east. If you can manage that, pick-up the stick of butter from the floor of the bathroom. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. An usual kind of place. Let's see what's in here.

 You see a bureau. Hmmm... what else, what else?[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The bureau contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The bureau is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a mantle. [if there is something on the s_0]On the mantle you can see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. A standard kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_1] On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] The counter appears to be empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a bathroom.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a case. Classic TextWorld.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The case contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a bedroom. Let's see what's in here.

 You can see a bar. The bar is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bar you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bar.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a workshop. An ordinary one. Let's see what's in here.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the chamber. Let's see what's in here.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a mantelpiece. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? [if there is something on the s_3]On the mantelpiece you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a cookhouse. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You see a platter. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the platter. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]The platter appears to be empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the platter.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a canteen. A normal one. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You see a plate. Does this look like anything mentioned in the instructions? [if there is something on the s_5]On the plate you can see [a list of things on the s_5]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. You think about smashing the plate to bits, throwing the bits in a fire, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You're now in a study.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a kitchenette. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so ordinary all of a sudden, it's because you've just sauntered into the office.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a laundry place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a bench. [if there is something on the s_6]On the bench you can see [a list of things on the s_6]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a salon. An ordinary kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a bedchamber like it isn't some huge deal.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You arrive in a garage. A typical kind of place.

 Hey, want to see a table? Look over there, a table. The table is normal.[if there is something on the s_7] On the table you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] The table appears to be empty. You think about smashing the table to bits, throwing the bits in a fire, etc, until you get bored.[end if] You see a workbench. The workbench is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_8] On the workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Ah, the cubicle. This is some kind of cubicle, really great usual vibes in this place, a wonderful usual atmosphere. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a stand. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. This always happens![end if] You see a bookshelf. [if there is something on the s_11]You see [a list of things on the s_11] on the bookshelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just an armchair. The armchair is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_12] On the armchair you can see [a list of things on the s_12].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_12] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You make out a chair. [if there is something on the s_9]You see [a list of things on the s_9] on the chair. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]However, the chair, like an empty chair, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: austere studio
infos.desc:
You've entered an austere studio.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the closet. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a basement.

 You see a crate.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a shelf. You shudder, but continue examining the shelf. The shelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_13] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_13].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_13] However, the shelf, like an empty shelf, has nothing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a rack. The rack is typical.[if there is something on the s_14] On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_14].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_14] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a parlor.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: it's a manageable gate [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: passageway
infos.desc: it's a robust passageway [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: hatch
infos.desc: it is what it is, a hatch [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: bureau
infos.desc: The bureau looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: crate
infos.desc: The crate looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: The stick of butter looks savory.

infos.name: mantle
infos.desc: The mantle is solidly built.

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is solid.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is solidly built.

infos.name: bookshelf
infos.desc: The bookshelf is shaky.

infos.name: armchair
infos.desc: The armchair is an unstable piece of trash.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is unstable.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is solidly built.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc: The bar is unstable.

infos.name: mantelpiece
infos.desc: The mantelpiece is balanced.

infos.name: platter
infos.desc: The platter is stable.

infos.name: plate
infos.desc: The plate is undependable.

infos.name: bench
infos.desc: The bench is an unstable piece of trash.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is stable.

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is balanced.

infos.name: chair
infos.desc: The chair is an unstable piece of junk.

infos.name: insect
infos.desc: The insect appears to be well matched to everything else here

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to go south. And then, make an attempt to venture south. Okay, and then, make an effort to travel west. Once you get through with that, make an attempt to travel north. And then, travel north. Then, try to move west. And then, take a trip north. Once you get through with that, go to the north. With that accomplished, travel west. Okay, and then, head west. Okay, and then, make an attempt to travel south. Next, attempt to travel south. After that, venture east. Then, recover the stick of butter from the floor of the bathroom. And if you do that, you're the winner!
